attributes.action: Grant Stephen Hawking CH, CBE, FRS, FRSA a Knighthood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stephen Hawking is a renowned British theoretical physicist who has expanded the boundaries of cosmology and deserves to be recognised for this lifetime work dispite suffering from neuro-muscular dystrophy

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
